name: Thai Satay Beef
recipeIngredient: 2 lbs beef top sirloin steak, sliced thin across grain, about 1/8-inch thick
recipeInstructions: 1. Combine all the ingredients for the marinade.
2. Slice the beef into thin strips.
3. Put the sliced beef in the marinade, cover with clingfilm, and refrigerate for 2 hours.
4. Thread onto four long metal skewers and barbecue for 8 minutes.
